attributes.action: Bring back the pump shotgun to Fortnite Battle Royale.
attributes.additional_details: Everyone thinks we should get the pump shotgun back in fortnite.
attributes.background: Fortnite have recently released all new season 9 to their battle royale mode which brought some questionable changes. Me and the fortnite community think that the removal of the pump shotgun has been one of the worst mistakes that they have made, and we can all agree we would appreciate it back.
